DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the analgesic efficacy of oxycodone and fentanyl in the treatment of postoperative pain after laparoscopic cholecystectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Oxycodone vs Fentanyl for Pain Treatment After Laparoscopic Cholecystectomy
DOC.criteria: Planned outpatient laparoscopic cholecystectomy >18 years Intolerance to study drugs Treatment with MAO inhibitors
